channel.title: FFS idk if anyone can connect to my sever plz help!
channel.description: kso , ive been Coding servers for some time, i decided to take a break during that break i got a router. . . after hours of trying to retrieve my router info to be able to port forward, i finally reset it and avoid the 30$ fee cisco support wanted to charge me so now, i edited my client form localhost to my ip i got all the port forwarding done, opened the port, and still can not connect :'( HOW EVER i can post my server on the server status with my ip . . . WTF does this mean ppl can still connect to my sever using my ip and i need to use or localhost??

item.title: FFS idk if anyone can connect to my sever plz help!
item.dc:creator: @thefuck thefuck
item.description:
@thefuck wrote:

lol, k thanks fo your opinion i was able to post my sever on mopar, i used utorrent to port forword AND i did it threw my router as well, and i have a no-ip, i enabled port 43594 and 5555 on my fire wall so i just figure other ppl can connect i just need to use localhost. maybe its the sorce, and yeah on the client i built i tryed switching the server in gui, i can still only connect from localhost, my no-ip dosent work nor my ip.

Read full topic
item.source: FFS idk if anyone can connect to my sever plz help!

item.title: FFS idk if anyone can connect to my sever plz help!
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Lol.

Pal. people should just stick to playing other’s.

Here’s some alternatives.

www.no-ip.com

Get a no-ip put it in your client.java - Client-sided and Source - Config.

utorrent, This is also a simple way to see if your portforwarded.

-Read a guide if your that dumb not to understand utorrent

www.canyouseeme.org - Check if your portforwarded on 43594.

Make sure client and source’s ip’s are correctly matched, and compiled.

Read full topic
item.source: FFS idk if anyone can connect to my sever plz help!

item.title: FFS idk if anyone can connect to my sever plz help!

@Anc13nts253 wrote:

Use your static IP to connect.
